iata:houseHeadOriginLocationCodeissuer.description: issuer of location codes (e.g. IATA, UN/LOCODE, ICAO…)

iata:houseHeadOriginLocationCode.description: Code of a city, seaport, airport, freight terminal, rail station or other place at which goods are unloaded from the means of transport having been used for their carriage. UNECE Recommendation 16 can be used.

iata:houseHeadOriginLocationName.description: if no location code available, specify the city's name

iata:houseHeadOriginLocationType.description: e.g. Seaport, Airport, FreightTerminal, RailStation, Other

iata:houseHeadOriginLocationCountryCode.description: ISO country code of city if no locationID available

iata:houseHeadOriginLocationCountryName.description: country name if no ISO country code available

iata:houseHeadDestinationLocationCodeiss.description: issuer of location codes (e.g. IATA, UN/LOCODE, ICAO…)

iata:houseHeadDestinationLocationCode.description: Code of a city, seaport, airport, freight terminal, rail station or other place at which goods are unloaded from the means of transport having been used for their carriage. UNECE Recommendation 16 can be used.

iata:houseHeadDestinationLocationName.description: if no location code available, specify the city's name

iata:houseHeadDestinationLocationType.description: e.g. Seaport, Airport, FreightTerminal, RailStation, Other.

iata:houseHeadDestinationLocationCountry.description: ISO country code of city if no locationID available
country name if no ISO country code available
